titleStmt.title: A commentary or exposition upon the books of Ezra, Nehemiah, Esther, Job and Psalms wherein the text is explained, some controversies are discussed ... : in all which divers other texts of scripture, which occasionally occurre, are fully opened ... / by John Trapp ...
titleStmt.author: Trapp, John, 1601-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Thomas Newberry ... and Joseph Barber ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
